keyMoments.title: Rapanui Spots the Sun and Guides the Escape
keyMoments.description: Rapanui demonstrates leadership by spotting the escape route through the collapsing dimension and directing both crews toward safety.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Rapanui as the true hero of the arc, showing he surpassed Henzo's abilities and became a capable leader.
keyMoments.quote: There! The sun! Everyone, head for the light!

keyMoments.title: Rapanui Sacrifices His Ship
keyMoments.description: Rapanui makes the heroic decision to stay behind and detonate the Marine warship Tarielishin, creating the wind needed to propel the Going Merry to safety.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Rapanui's selfless heroism and willingness to sacrifice Marine property to save pirates, showing his loyalty transcends institutional duty.
keyMoments.quote: I'll stay behind and blow up the ship. The wind from the explosion will push you out!

keyMoments.title: Time Travel Identity Revealed
keyMoments.description: Rapanui reveals that he and the other Marines are actually the adult versions of the Pumpkin Pirates, thrown fifty years into the past by the Rainbow Mist's collapse.
keyMoments.significance: The climactic twist of the entire arc, explaining the stable time loop and showing how the Pumpkin Pirates orchestrated their own rescue.
keyMoments.quote: We've been waiting for this day for fifty years, Henzo. We're the Pumpkin Pirates!

keyMoments.title: Reunion with Henzo
keyMoments.description: Rapanui reunites with his childhood friend Henzo, now fifty years his junior, and reassures him that their friendship never wavered despite the temporal separation.
keyMoments.significance: Provides emotional closure for both characters and demonstrates the enduring nature of their bond across five decades.
keyMoments.quote: I'm still a Pumpkin Pirate and Henzo's friend.

reveals.information: Revealed to be a time-displaced Pumpkin Pirate who became a Marine after being thrown fifty years into the past

relationships.description: Childhood friend and fellow Pumpkin Pirate. Maintained friendship across fifty years of temporal separation.

evolutionMoments.description: Reunites with Henzo after the time-travel twist is revealed, reassuring him of their enduring friendship.

keyMoments.title: Learns Truth About the Pumpkin Pirates
keyMoments.description: Henzo discovers that his childhood friends became Marines after being thrown fifty years into the past, and that they deliberately kept this secret to ensure the timeline remained intact.
keyMoments.significance: This revelation provides the emotional climax of Henzo's character arc and releases him from fifty years of guilt over failing to rescue his friends.

keyMoments.title: Emotional Reunion with Childhood Friends
keyMoments.description: Henzo reunites with the Pumpkin Pirates, now fifty years older than him and successful Marine officers, learning that they never blamed him and lived fulfilling lives.
keyMoments.significance: Provides closure for Henzo's guilt and demonstrates that his friends not only survived but thrived, validating his fifty-year effort to understand the Rainbow Mist.

reveals.information: Spent fifty years researching the Rainbow Mist to rescue his friends, not knowing they had been thrown into the past and became the Marines pursuing the Straw Hats

relationships.description: Childhood friend and fellow Pumpkin Pirate, separated by fifty years of temporal displacement.

evolutionMoments.description: Reunites with adult Rapanui after learning the truth about the time travel.

keyMoments.title: Revealed as Time-Displaced Pumpkin Pirate
keyMoments.description: Isoka is revealed to be one of the Pumpkin Pirates who became a Marine after being thrown fifty years into the past by the Rainbow Mist's collapse.
keyMoments.significance: Part of the arc's climactic twist, showing that the Marines pursuing the Straw Hats were actually the children they helped rescue.

keyMoments.title: Arrests Wetton
keyMoments.description: As a Marine officer, Isoka participates in the arrest of Mayor Wetton for his crimes of piracy and corruption.
keyMoments.significance: Provides justice for Wetton's crimes and shows the Pumpkin Pirates' growth from victims to enforcers of justice.

reveals.information: Revealed to be a time-displaced Pumpkin Pirate who became a Marine

keyMoments.title: Wetton is Arrested
keyMoments.description: After being defeated by Luffy and confronted by the adult Pumpkin Pirates, Wetton is formally arrested by the Marines for piracy and corruption.
keyMoments.significance: Provides justice for Wetton's crimes and liberates Ruluka Island from his tyrannical rule. His arrest by his former victims adds poetic justice.

keyMoments.title: Escapes the Rainbow Mist
keyMoments.description: Luffy and the Straw Hats successfully navigate the Going Merry out of the collapsing Rainbow Mist dimension.
keyMoments.significance: The crew overcomes another dangerous situation and prepares to continue their journey toward Sky Island.

keyMoments.title: Released by the Marines
keyMoments.description: The Marine officers (Pumpkin Pirates) choose to let Luffy and his crew go free out of gratitude for their help.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the impact of the Straw Hats' kindness and shows that not all Marines are strict rule-followers.

keyMoments.title: Escapes the Rainbow Mist
keyMoments.description: Zoro assists in navigating the Going Merry out of the collapsing dimension.
keyMoments.significance: The crew overcomes the immediate danger and continues their journey.

keyMoments.title: Navigates Escape from Rainbow Mist
keyMoments.description: As navigator, Nami helps guide the Going Merry through the dimensional collapse.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Nami's navigational skills in extreme circumstances.

keyMoments.title: Escapes the Rainbow Mist
keyMoments.description: Usopp celebrates as the Going Merry successfully escapes the collapsing dimension.
keyMoments.significance: Relief and celebration at surviving another dangerous situation.
keyMoments.quote: We made it! We're out of the Rainbow Mist!

keyMoments.title: Witnesses Ship Falling from Sky
keyMoments.description: Usopp is shocked to see a massive ship fall from the sky near Ruluka Island.
keyMoments.significance: First concrete evidence of Sky Island's existence.
keyMoments.quote: A ship fell from the sky?!

keyMoments.title: Escapes the Rainbow Mist
keyMoments.description: Sanji assists in the crew's escape from the collapsing dimension.
keyMoments.significance: The crew survives another dangerous situation.

name.japanese: トニートニー・チョッパー

keyMoments.title: Escapes the Rainbow Mist
keyMoments.description: Chopper assists in the crew's escape from the collapsing dimension.
keyMoments.significance: The crew survives another dangerous situation.

keyMoments.title: Escapes the Rainbow Mist
keyMoments.description: Robin assists in the crew's escape from the collapsing dimension.
keyMoments.significance: The crew survives another dangerous situation.
